channel.title: Problem with Combat
channel.description:
Hi guys, I'm having a problem with player vs NPC combat. It seems that my source, is edited from a source which was edited from a source. By the time all this had happened private servers had slowly mutilated by making combat training against objects and adding such things as spawning (eek!). But anyway, my problem is, I've added a leprechaun to my server and when I fight it, it owns me. This leprechaun is level 9, and my character is 126 with a whip and it's getting owned. Can anyone help me fix this?
Many thanks,
Syrillia.

item.title: Problem with Combat
item.dc:creator: @Syrillia Syrillia
item.description:
@Syrillia wrote:

OK.

edit OK, I did it, and it all works fine. I didn’t actually know having ‘0’ as HP made the super strong. You learn something new everyday.

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with Combat
item.dc:creator: @lov3_rs_money lov3_rs_money
item.description:
@lov3_rs_money wrote:

yeah go to npc.cfg,
search for ur npc id (leprechaun)
then ull see the lvl ( 7)
then probs a 0 after
change that 0 to the number of hp u want it to have
hope it helped!

lov3_rs_money

Read full topic
